Event.Text: A distress signal was picked up by our rover, and a distressed voice comes over the speakers. ”Finally someone picks up! Listen, you have to help us! We just bought some supplies from a bandit caravan, and in one of the boxes, some scary bomb looking thing was in there! We’re just alcohol farmers, we can’t deal with this stuff. We’ll give you anything, just please help us!”

Choice.Text: Keep driving. Sounds like something way out of our league.
Go see what they are talking about.
